talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: Osechi is a traditional Japanese dish! We only eat it on New Year's Day, but it's not very tasty. Haha. üòõWhat do you eat on New Year's Day there?

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter:
Why isn't it tasty? üòØ The info I looked up listed lots of foods that looked good.

My partner and I like to make a charcuterie board, except we don't have a fancy board so we just put the food on a plate lol. Lots of people have parties on New Year's Eve so party foods are popular

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter:
The charcuterie board looks delicious too!! Even if you want to buy a nice plate, it's secondary. All you need is delicious food!ü•¥
